A Product_category is a classification for a product identified by the category name.
A Product_category may be assigned directly to a product as the specific product type. A product that is a Automobile may have Product_categories of drivetrain or body parts.
Product_category instances may be structured into classification hierarchies of categories and subcategories. Wheel assemblies may consist of spindles with hub sub assemblies, hub subassemblies may consist of lugs, lugs nuts and wheels, and wheel assemblies may consist of tires and wheel covers.
the identification of the product_category
optional description of the category name
the optional organization or person in organization that defines or owns the category.
The owner role shall be 'category owner'.
A Product_category_hierarchy object supports structured hierarchies of categories and subcategories.
the parent Product_category in the classification hierarchy
the child Product_category in the classification hierarchy
